value:
$WmMPID_クロム,ch04_00_Chrom_M_Normal,Face|$w0|You're the invaders from this
so-called Order of Heroes?$k$pWe've just gotten word from the
Emblian soldiers that you've come
here to raze our realm.$k$pI'm warning you now—no one
will bring harm to the Halidom of
Ylisse. Not on my watch.$k$pNow you face me and my Shepherds.
Lissa! Frederick! Prepare for battle.$k$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_クロム,ch04_00_Chrom_M_Normal,Face|$w0|We will not admit defeat so easily.
The rest of the Shepherds will
stop you.$k$pOur bonds are strong—we will never
submit to you, villains.$k$Sbs150|
